274        
275//      private final boolean[][] Q; 
276        private int iterations = -1;    // iterations performed in last applyTo()
277        
278        public BinaryThinning() {
279//              this.Q = makeDeletionCodeTable();
280        }
281        
282        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
283        
284        @Override
285        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor ip) {
286                int iMax = ip.getWidth() + ip.getHeight();
287                applyTo(ip, iMax);
288        }
289        
290        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor ip, int iMax) {
291                int nd;
292                int iter = 0;
293                do {
294                        nd = thinOnce(ip);
295                        iter++;
296                } while (nd > 0 && iter <  iMax);
297                this.iterations = iter;
298        }
299        
300        public int getIterations() {
301                if (iterations < 0) {
302                        throw new IllegalStateException("no iteration count available, call applyTo() first");
303                }
304                return iterations;
305        }
306        
307        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
308        
309        // Single thinning iteration. Returns the number of deletions performed (for debugging only).
310        public int thinOnce(ByteProcessor ip) {
311                final int M = ip.getWidth();
312                final int N = ip.getHeight();
313                final List<PntInt> D = new ArrayList<>();
314                final byte[] NH = new byte[8];
315                int n = 0;
316                for (int pass = 0; pass < 2; pass++) {  // make 2 passes
317                        D.clear();
318                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
319                                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
320                                        if (ip.get(u, v) > 0) {
321//                                              get8Neighborhood(ip, u, v, NH);
322//                                              int c = get8NeighborhoodIndex(NH);
323                                                int c = get8NeighborhoodIndex(ip, u, v);
324                                                if (Q[c][pass]) {
325                                                        D.add(PntInt.from(u, v));
326                                                        n = n + 1;
327                                                }
328                                        }
329                                }
330                        }                       
331                        for (PntInt p : D) {
332                                ip.putPixel(p.x, p.y, 0);
333                        }
334
335                }
336                return n;
337        }
338        
339        private void get8Neighborhood(ByteProcessor I, int u, int v, byte[] NH) {
340                NH[0] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u+1, v));
341                NH[1] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u+1, v-1));
342                NH[2] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u, v-1));
343                NH[3] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u-1, v-1));
344                NH[4] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u-1, v));
345                NH[5] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u-1, v+1));
346                NH[6] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u, v+1));
347                NH[7] =  binarize(I.getPixel(u+1, v+1));
348        }
349        
350        private int get8NeighborhoodIndex(byte[] NH) {
351//              int c = 0;
352//              for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
353//                      if (NH[i] != 0) {
354//                              c = c | (1 << i);
355//                      }
356//              }
357//              return c;       // c = 0,...,255
358                return NH[0] + NH[1] * 2 + NH[2] * 4 + NH[3] * 8 + NH[4] * 16 
359                                + NH[5] * 32 + NH[6] * 64 + NH[7] * 128;
360        }
361        
362        // get neighborhood index directly, without extracting neighborhood vector itself:
363        private int get8NeighborhoodIndex(ByteProcessor I, int u, int v) {
364                int c = 0;
365                if (I.getPixel(u+1, v)   != 0)  c+= 1;          // NH[0]
366                if (I.getPixel(u+1, v-1) != 0)  c+= 2;          // NH[1]
367                if (I.getPixel(u, v-1)   != 0)  c+= 4;          // NH[2]
368                if (I.getPixel(u-1, v-1) != 0)  c+= 8;          // NH[3]
369                if (I.getPixel(u-1, v)   != 0)  c+= 16;         // NH[4]
370                if (I.getPixel(u-1, v+1) != 0)  c+= 32;         // NH[5]
371                if (I.getPixel(u, v+1)   != 0)  c+= 64;         // NH[6]
372                if (I.getPixel(u+1, v+1) != 0)  c+= 128;        // NH[7]
373                return c;       // c = 0,...,255
374        }
375
376        // --------------------------------------------------------------
377        
378        // only used once to calculate Q
379        private static boolean[][] makeDeletionCodeTable() {
380                boolean[][] Q = new boolean[256][2];
381                for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
382                        byte[] N = new byte[8];
383                        for (int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
384                                N[j] = ((i & (1 << j)) != 0) ? B1 : B0;         // test bit j of i
385                        }
386//                      System.out.format("%d: %s\n", i, Arrays.toString(N));
387                        Q[i][0] = R1(N);
388                        Q[i][1] = R2(N);
389                }               
390                return Q;
391        }
392        
393        // --------------------------------------------------------------
394
395        private static byte binarize(int i) {
396                return (i == 0) ? B0 : B1;
397        }
398
399        private static boolean R1(byte[] NH) {
400                final int b = B(NH);
401                final int c = C(NH);
402                return 
403                        //NH[0] == 1 &&
404                        2 <= b && b <= 6 &&
405                        c == 1 &&
406                        NH[6] * NH[0] * NH[2] == 0 &&
407                        NH[4] * NH[6] * NH[0] == 0;
408        }
409        
410        private static boolean R2(byte[] NH) {
411                final int b = B(NH);
412                final int c = C(NH);
413                return 
414                        //NH[0] == 1 &&
415                        2 <= b && b <= 6 &&
416                        c == 1 &&
417                        NH[0] * NH[2] * NH[4] == 0 &&
418                                NH[2] * NH[4] * NH[6] == 0;
419        }
420        
421        private static int B(byte[] NH) {
422                return NH[0] + NH[1] + NH[2] + NH[3] + NH[4] + NH[5] + NH[6] + NH[7];
423        }
424        
425        private static int C(byte[] NH) { // NH = (N0, N1, N2, N3, N4, N5, N6, N7)
426                int c = 0;
427                for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
428                        c = c + NH[i] * (NH[i] - NH[(i+1) % 8]);
429                }
430                return c;
431        }
432
433
